name: The Clone Progenitor
description:
Evacuate all the clones on the Clone Progentior ship Catharsis, in this Mancala inspired Pico 8.

Use the arrow keys to select different pods and press Z to deposit each egg in that bed into the beds next to it in an anti-clockwise fashion. The goal is to get as many as you can into the escape pods on either side of the screen.

Malfunctions will pop up occasionally, they can only be repaired by having the last egg in a move land in that bed. This also turns eggs into clones, otherwise you know, eggs are performing underage labour..

Sound and music to come.

Graphical Artifacts thanks to jclaremont, find it in their great, slimy Metroid-like game.

Pixel Planet art thanks to "Master484" - http://m484games.ucoz.com/

http://opengameart.org/content/pixel-planets
